rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
通过经济实惠的高分辨率技术彻底改变显微镜技术伊利诺伊大学厄巴纳-香槟分校的研究人员首次证明，不再需要昂贵的像差校正显微镜即可实现破纪录的显微分辨率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Revolutionizing-microscopy-with-affordable-high-resolution-techniques.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Revolutionizing-microscopy-with-affordable-high-resolution-techniques.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3835454c-e278-423f-8385-1bb08088b479 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 23:12:31 -0500 Revolutionizing microscopy with affordable high-resolution techniques
克罗地亚海茴香可能含有防腐剂和抗衰老代谢物的宝库《食品》杂志上的一项研究发现，克罗地亚海茴香的精油和纯露具有显着的抗衰老潜力，其化学成分和功能与法国海茴香不同，这表明其具有独特的化妆品用途。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Croatian-sea-fennel-may-contain-a-treasure-trove-of-preservative-and-anti-aging-metabolites.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Croatian-sea-fennel-may-contain-a-treasure-trove-of-preservative-and-anti-aging-metabolites.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae556e7b-7498-405c-b079-fb36b452c6e1 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 23:12:00 -0500 Croatian sea fennel may contain a treasure trove of preservative and anti-aging metabolites
认知行为疗法有助于预防资源匮乏地区的产后心理健康挑战美国国立卫生研究院资助的一项大型临床试验结果表明，为生活在巴基斯坦的孕妇提供的焦虑干预措施显着降低了孕妇在出生后六周出现中度至重度焦虑、抑郁或两者兼而有之的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Cognitive-behavioral-therapy-helps-prevent-postpartum-mental-health-challenges-in-low-resource-settings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Cognitive-behavioral-therapy-helps-prevent-postpartum-mental-health-challenges-in-low-resource-settings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de90f5f0-a562-40ec-8553-7bf3488ac3ef Mon, 26 Feb 2024 23:05:37 -0500 Cognitive behavioral therapy helps prevent postpartum mental health challenges in low-resource settings
螺旋藻在对抗心脏病和糖尿病方面显示出希望研究人员表明，螺旋藻的治疗功效（包括抗炎和抗糖尿病特性）可以显着降低心血管疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Spirulina-shows-promise-in-batdling-heart-disease-and-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Spirulina-shows-promise-in-batdling-heart-disease-and-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19cba11c-7f37-437f-b35b-7e8761d44a7c Mon, 26 Feb 2024 22:45:00 -0500 Spirulina shows promise in battling heart disease and diabetes
研究发现奥马珠单抗可增强对多种食物过敏的耐受性《新英格兰医学杂志》的一项研究表明，奥马珠单抗可提高多种食物过敏个体的过敏原耐受性，提供了一种有前景的独立治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Omalizumab-boosts-tolerance-to-multiple-food-allergies-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Omalizumab-boosts-tolerance-to-multiple-food-allergies-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a742220-af62-4cab-a917-f20d6614086c Mon, 26 Feb 2024 22:13:00 -0500 Omalizumab boosts tolerance to multiple food allergies, study finds
研究表明，富含黄酮醇的饮食可降低死亡率和疾病风险研究发现，膳食中黄酮醇的摄入量较高与美国成年人全因死亡率的降低以及阿尔茨海默病、癌症和心血管疾病的风险降低有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Flavonol-rich-diet-linked-to-lower-mortality-and-disease-risk-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Flavonol-rich-diet-linked-to-lower-mortality-and-disease-risk-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37a5c361-cfe5-4da7-95ae-fdbd0c8bdd5d Mon, 26 Feb 2024 21:54:00 -0500 Flavonol-rich diet linked to lower mortality and disease risk, study shows
研究发现电子烟会增加感染 COVID-19 的可能性加州大学河滨分校的一项研究发现，电子烟使用者很容易受到 SARS-CoV-2 的感染，这种病毒传播 COVID-19 并继续感染世界各地的人们。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Vaping-increases-susceptibility-to-COVID-19-infection-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Vaping-increases-susceptibility-to-COVID-19-infection-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f102c3eb-eb9c-4eb9-af0e-e18437d72751 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 21:53:26 -0500 Vaping increases susceptibility to COVID-19 infection, study finds
创新的在线工具旨在通过个性化睡眠计划降低 SIDS 风险一项研究表明，布里斯托大学研究人员开发的一种新的基于网络的婴儿睡眠计划可以帮助挽救婴儿免受婴儿猝死综合症或 SIDS 的生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Innovative-online-tool-aims-to-lower-SIDS-risk-through-personalized-sleep-plans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Innovative-online-tool-aims-to-lower-SIDS-risk-through-personalized-sleep-plans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac15e82b-0b1b-4734-8e17-457159f8cf49 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 21:48:00 -0500 Innovative online tool aims to lower SIDS risk through personalized sleep plans
波士顿学院生物学家获得美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 资助，研究病毒胰岛素用于癌症治疗波士顿学院生物学助理教授 Emrah Altindis 获得美国国立卫生研究院颁发的为期五年、价值 250 万美元的资助，用于研究病毒胰岛素和 IGF-1 受体蛋白抑制相关机制及其在癌症治疗中的潜在应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Boston-College-biographer-wins-NIH-grant-to-study-viral-insulins-for-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Boston-College-biographer-wins-NIH-grant-to-study-viral-insulins-for-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73a4927f-29ae-4e3a-9bd1-cceb289a8ac6 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 21:41:22 -0500 Boston College biologist wins NIH grant to study viral insulins for cancer treatment
创新疗法靶向并破坏白血病干细胞美国最大的癌症研究和治疗组织之一希望之城的科学家们设计了一种创新方法来瞄准和破坏难以杀死的白血病干细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Innovative-therapy-targets-and-destroys-leukemia-stem-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Innovative-therapy-targets-and-destroys-leukemia-stem-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=213f0ed3-8d59-450f-8eff-1adba3330e24 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 21:37:39 -0500 Innovative therapy targets and destroys leukemia stem cells
